section.section: A person whose dealer's license is suspended or revoked and who is aggrieved by the action of the Secretary may request a hearing by writing to the Secretary within 30 days after the Secretary forwards notice to the applicant under § 5-114(c) of this subtitle.
The Secretary shall grant the hearing within 15 days after receiving the request.

text.section: The hearing shall be held in accordance with Title 10, Subtitle 2 of the State Government Article.
